description: Automated git workflow - stage changes and check status

hooks.command: if git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then echo '📁 Git: Staging changes...'; git add "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null; git status --porcelain | head -10; echo '💡 Use "git commit -m \"your message\"" to commit changes'; else echo 'ℹ️  Not in a git repository'; fi

if git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1 && [[ -f "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" ]]; then echo '🔍 Checking file status before edit:'; git status "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || echo 'File not tracked by git'; fi
